PAD_OutfitRoom_2.text: All these disguises... we were taught that Lady Shar's warriors had to be able to hide in plain sight, wherever we went...
PAD_OutfitRoom_2.context: NodeContext: Thoughtful. Memory stirred by a room full of costumes and disguises. Arc - loyal to shar

PAD_OutfitRoom_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_OutfitRoom_1.text: I think this was my favourite part - losing myself in here. Being someone else, even just for a while.
PAD_OutfitRoom_1.context: NodeContext: Fond half-remembered memories. Arc - loyal to shar

PAD_SpottedParents_0.speaker: Player
PAD_SpottedParents_0.text: I... I see them. I see my parents. Gods... what's been done to them?
PAD_SpottedParents_0.context: NodeContext: Urgent, tinged with horror. Seeing her captive parents suspended (alive) in the centre of the room. Arc: SH has rejected Shar and is looking to save her parents.

PAD_SpottedParents_1.speaker: Player
PAD_SpottedParents_1.text: Prisoners...? Is this my final task for Lady Shar?
PAD_SpottedParents_1.context: NodeContext: A lttle confusion/disquiet. Seeing 'prisoners' (her parents) suspended (alive) in the centre of the room. Arc: loyal to shar,having just staged a coup to take over her church.

PAD_SpottedParents_2.speaker: Player
PAD_SpottedParents_2.text: Are those prisoners? What's been done to them?

AD_Interim_SharranTrainee_000_0.speaker: Sharran Novice Dohna
AD_Interim_SharranTrainee_000_0.text: Bless us, Dark Lady. We have cleansed your church.
AD_Interim_SharranTrainee_000_0.context: NodeContext: Solo murmured prayer to her dark goddess, in the aftermath of a coup and battle in which she was persuaded to side with the coup instigators.Now seeking blessing.

AD_Interim_SharranTrainee_000_1.speaker: Sharran Novice Dohna
AD_Interim_SharranTrainee_000_1.text: Only we who seek your embrace remain, Nightsinger.
AD_Interim_SharranTrainee_000_1.context: NodeContext: Solo murmured prayer to her dark goddess, in the aftermath of a coup and battle in which she was persuaded to side with the coup instigators.Now seeking blessing.

AD_Interim_SharranTrainee_000_2.speaker: Sharran Novice Dohna
AD_Interim_SharranTrainee_000_2.text: We have fed them to the dark maw. They return to the nothingness that claims all.
AD_Interim_SharranTrainee_000_2.context: NodeContext: Solo murmured prayer to her dark goddess, in the aftermath of a coup and battle in which she was persuaded to side with the coup instigators.Now seeking blessing.

AD_Interim_SharranTrainee_000_3.speaker: Sharran Novice Dohna
AD_Interim_SharranTrainee_000_3.text: Pride corrupted those who claimed to serve you, but no more.
AD_Interim_SharranTrainee_000_3.context: NodeContext: Solo murmured prayer to her dark goddess, in the aftermath of a coup and battle in which she was persuaded to side with the coup instigators.Now seeking blessing.

AD_SwearFealty_ViconiaCultist_002_0.speaker: Sharran Novice Greymask
AD_SwearFealty_ViconiaCultist_002_0.text: I live to serve Lady Shadowheart. She speaks with the Nightsinger's voice.
AD_SwearFealty_ViconiaCultist_002_0.context: NodeContext: Fervent declaration of loyalty. 'all hail the queen' vibe.

AD_ViconiaExploitFear_0.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_0.text: I know greatest fear, girl. I was there when it was born - the wolves that hunt you.
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_0.context: NodeContext: A battle taunt as she uses magic to exploit a fear that the player revealed to her earlier - in this case, Shadowheart's fear of wolves, based on a childhood memory.

AD_ViconiaExploitFear_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_1.text: Do you dread the parasite growing inside you? You should do...
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_1.context: NodeContext: A battle taunt as she uses magic to exploit a fear that the player revealed to her earlier.

AD_ViconiaExploitFear_2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_2.text: You professed a fear of darkness to Lady Shar's servant? Most foolish...
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_2.context: NodeContext: A battle taunt as she uses magic to exploit a fear that the player revealed to her earlier.

AD_ViconiaExploitFear_3.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_3.text: All will turn on you. All will abandon you. Your wildest terror, come to pass.
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_3.context: NodeContext: A battle taunt as she uses magic to exploit a fear that the player revealed to her earlier.

AD_ViconiaExploitFear_4.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_4.text: You shall be rendered powerless, just as you feared.
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_4.context: NodeContext: A battle taunt as she uses magic to exploit a fear that the player revealed to her earlier.

AD_ViconiaExploitFear_5.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_5.text: Do web-weaving spiders fill you with terror? Then face them.
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_5.context: NodeContext: A battle taunt as she uses magic to exploit a fear that the player revealed to her earlier.

AD_ViconiaExploitFear_6.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_6.text: Maladies, disease, the enemy within. Let them take you now.
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_6.context: NodeContext: A battle taunt as she uses magic to exploit a fear that the player revealed to her earlier.

AD_ViconiaExploitFear_7.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_7.text: You kept your fears hidden from me - but no matter. You shall die all the same.
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_7.context: NodeContext: Battle taunt. Viconia learned of none of the player's fears and  therefore cannot exploit them. She is confident they will die all the same.

AD_ViconiaExploitFear_8.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_8.text: I know your fears, girl -the unknown father, offering an embrace of fang and claw.
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_8.context: NodeContext: Spoken to her one-time protege, Shadowheart. Referring to a childhood fear of a wolf, since revealed to be Shadowheart's father. Viconia will exploit this fear in combat

AD_ViconiaExploitFear_9.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_9.text: You revealed no fear to me... but perhaps spiders will enweb your courage.
AD_ViconiaExploitFear_9.context: NodeContext: Battle taunt. Viconia failed to discover a fear of the player to use against them in combat, so takes a guess.

RightCheckpoint_Warning_0.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Hyrald
RightCheckpoint_Warning_0.context: NodeContext: Sentry warning a would-be trespasser

PAD_BlackMirror_0.speaker: Player
PAD_BlackMirror_0.text: That mirror... now that I remember. I'd stand before it. Marvel at how it seemed to consume all...
PAD_BlackMirror_0.context: NodeContext: Recognition/disquiet upon looking at an ominous sharran artefact

PAD_BlackMirror_1.speaker: Player
PAD_BlackMirror_1.text: That mirror reflects nothing - it only consumes, and offers darkness.

PAD_BlackMirror_2.speaker: Player
PAD_BlackMirror_2.text: This mirror is ancient - all the way back to the time of Gorothir. Almost like a window to the Shadowfell.

PAD_AltarLoot_0.speaker: Player
PAD_AltarLoot_0.text: The disc moved - must be connected to the offerings on the altar.

AD_OnTurn_SharranTrainee_002_3.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
AD_OnTurn_SharranTrainee_002_3.text: The darkness shall have you, alive or dead.

PAD_DefeatedParentAway_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_DefeatedParentAway_0.text: Agh... my wound. It burned with pain, then... nothing? Why? Something's wrong.
PAD_DefeatedParentAway_0.context: NodeContext: Wince of pain at the start, followed by confusion/concern

PAD_DefeatedParentAway_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_DefeatedParentAway_1.text: Agh... Lady Shar's mark. I felt it burn, then it just... stopped. Why? Something's wrong.
PAD_DefeatedParentAway_1.context: NodeContext: Wince of pain at the start, followed by confusion/concern

ShadowheartFather_1.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ShadowheartFather_1.context: NodeContext: Dazed and weak, but happy. Freed after years of captivity.

ShadowheartFather_2.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ShadowheartFather_2.text: Need to stay strong... need to shut out the pain... shut out everything...
ShadowheartFather_2.context: NodeContext: Weak but urging himself on. Captive/has been subjected to a great deal of torture.

AD_OnTurn_GrottoCheckpointGuard_002_0.speaker: Sharran Sentry Hendly
AD_OnTurn_GrottoCheckpointGuard_002_0.text: The Dark Lady's foes must die!

AD_OnTurn_GrottoCheckpointGuard_002_1.speaker: Sharran Sentry Hendly
AD_OnTurn_GrottoCheckpointGuard_002_1.text: I shall offer your blood to Lady Shar.

AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_000_0.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_000_0.text: All this time, the Mother Superior was unworthy? I don't understand...
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_000_0.context: NodeContext: Spoken to self with some confusion/attempting to parse events: a coup has been launched against his one-time leader at the sharran cult. He survived the fight that ensued, but his old leader has been vanquished and a new order is about to assume power.

AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_000_1.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_000_1.text: Perhaps I followed her too blindly, if Lady Shar abandoned her.
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_000_1.context: NodeContext: Spoken to self with some confusion/attempting to parse events: a coup has been launched against his one-time leader at the sharran cult. He survived the fight that ensued, but his old leader has been vanquished and a new order is about to assume power.

AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_000_2.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_000_2.text: At least I still draw breath. Not all can say the same.
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_000_2.context: NodeContext: Spoken to self with some confusion/attempting to parse events: a coup has been launched against his one-time leader at the sharran cult. He survived the fight that ensued, but his old leader has been vanquished and a new order is about to assume power.

AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_000_3.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_000_3.text: I always believed she spoke for the Nightsinger. But surely she would have prevailed then?
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_000_3.context: NodeContext: Spoken to self with some confusion/attempting to parse events: a coup has been launched against his one-time leader at the sharran cult. He survived the fight that ensued, but his old leader has been vanquished and a new order is about to assume power.

OptionalCultist_000_0.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gloommask
OptionalCultist_000_0.text: I remember you crying after lights out when we first started our training. Now look at you.

OptionalCultist_000_1.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gloommask
OptionalCultist_000_1.text: I hear the city above is in turmoil - good. Despair swells our numbers.

OptionalCultist_000_2.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gloommask
OptionalCultist_000_2.text: And to think - we were told you had so much promise.

OptionalCultist_000_3.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gloommask
OptionalCultist_000_3.text: Lady Shar has chosen her new representative. It is but a passing thing; we all return to her embrace, in the end.

OptionalCultist_000_4.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gloommask
OptionalCultist_000_4.text: Wonders never cease. You must have hidden mettle, to have been honoured by the Dark Lady.

OptionalCultist_000_5.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gloommask
OptionalCultist_000_5.text: We are closer to the Nightsinger here. Beneath the ground, far from the sun and moon.

OptionalCultist_000_6.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gloommask
OptionalCultist_000_6.text: Enjoy your newfound power while you can, my lady. Such mortal pleasures will all be lost in the end. Lady Shar wills it.

OptionalCultist_000_7.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gloommask
OptionalCultist_000_7.text: It is high time we changed things around here. We were growing complacent.

OptionalCultist_000_8.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gloommask
OptionalCultist_000_8.text: A clean death is too good for you. We should allow the most fumbling of initiates to hone their skills on you.

PAD_Mannequin_Bard_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Mannequin_Bard_1.text: This tunic... I'm sure I wore it. Did I have to disguise myself as a bard?
PAD_Mannequin_Bard_1.context: NodeContext: Half-remembering something from her training.

PAD_Mannequin_Bard_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Mannequin_Bard_0.text: Hells, did I have to sing? The things I did for Lady Shar...
PAD_Mannequin_Bard_0.context: NodeContext: A little mortified. Shar and Enemy of Shar line variants.

AD_OnTurn_GrottoCheckpointGuard_003_1.speaker: Sharran Sentry Baxta
AD_OnTurn_GrottoCheckpointGuard_003_1.text: I offer you as sacrifice to Lady Shar!

ShadowheartMother_1.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ShadowheartMother_1.context: NodeContext: In pain/unable to speak at length.

ShadowheartMother_2.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ShadowheartMother_2.text: We're... we're saved. Am I dreaming?

PAD_AttackedParentSH_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_AttackedParentSH_0.text: Touch them again and it'll be the last thing you do!

PAD_AttackedParentSH_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_AttackedParentSH_1.text: Stop - they're mine to deal with. Touch them and you die.

DefeatedParents_0.speaker: Shadowheart
DefeatedParents_0.text: This was to be my proving ground - Lady Shar was going to honour me.

DefeatedParents_3.speaker: Shadowheart
DefeatedParents_3.text: But you stole that from me... so now this place can be your tomb.

DefeatedParents_2.speaker: Shadowheart
DefeatedParents_2.text: I came here to save them, and you murdered them.
DefeatedParents_2.context: NodeContext: Shock, outrage. Player killed her parents.

DefeatedParents_1.speaker: Shadowheart
DefeatedParents_1.text: I may not have known them like a daughter should, but I'll still avenge them.
DefeatedParents_1.context: NodeContext: Shock, outrage. Player killed her parents.

PAD_DefeatedParentNoAvatar_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_DefeatedParentNoAvatar_0.text: What have you done?! As soon as I get back to camp, you and I are finished.

PAD_DefeatedParentNoAvatar_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_DefeatedParentNoAvatar_1.text: They were my sacrifice to make. This will not stand - expect to answer for it at camp.

PAD_FoundHideOut_0.speaker: Player
PAD_FoundHideOut_0.text: Shadowheart's old hideaway, by the look of it.

PAD_FoundHideOut_1.speaker: Player
PAD_FoundHideOut_1.text: Curious. Looks like someone made a little den for themselves here.

LeftCheckpoint_Warning_0.speaker: Sharran Sentry Baxta
LeftCheckpoint_Warning_0.context: NodeContext: Warning to a potential trespasser

PAD_LossDoorPlaque_1.speaker: Player
PAD_LossDoorPlaque_1.text: 'Only a Patriar's Loss can open this door.'

PAD_LossDoorPlaque_0.speaker: Player
PAD_LossDoorPlaque_0.text: What does that mean? Loss of status? Wealth?
PAD_LossDoorPlaque_0.context: NodeContext: Reacting to the text of a plaque and what it may be hinting at.

AD_SwearFealty_SharranTrainee_000_0.speaker: Sharran Novice Dohna
AD_SwearFealty_SharranTrainee_000_0.text: I swear myself to Shadowheart, the Nightsinger's chosen.
AD_SwearFealty_SharranTrainee_000_0.context: NodeContext: Fervent declaration of loyalty/ 'All hail the queen' vibe.

AD_SwearFealty_SwayedDarkJusticiar_0.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
AD_SwearFealty_SwayedDarkJusticiar_0.text: I am your servant. Lead us to Lady Shar's final victory.
AD_SwearFealty_SwayedDarkJusticiar_0.context: NodeContext: Fervent declaration of loyalty. 'All hail the queen'

ViconiaDefeated_NoShadowheart_0.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_NoShadowheart_0.text: I bleed for you, Nightsinger. Reward me with your embrace.
ViconiaDefeated_NoShadowheart_0.context: NodeContext: Wounded, seeking help from her goddess.

ViconiaDefeated_NoShadowheart_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_NoShadowheart_1.text: Ngh... Staunch my wounds, Dark Lady...
ViconiaDefeated_NoShadowheart_1.context: NodeContext: Wounded, seeking help from her goddess.

SharranInformer_0.speaker: Ferg Drogher
SharranInformer_0.text: Who knows, perhaps Mother Superior will show mercy...? No, even you're not gullible enough to believe that.
SharranInformer_0.context: NodeContext: Addressing Shadowheart. Chuckles to self after 'show mercy'.

SharranInformer_1.speaker: Ferg Drogher
SharranInformer_1.text: Bold of you to just stroll in as if you owned the place. But perhaps you shall, soon enough...
SharranInformer_1.context: NodeContext: Addressing Shadowheart. Hedging his bets (she could take over the cult, or fail)

SharranInformer_2.speaker: Ferg Drogher
SharranInformer_2.text: Well, nothing like a little insurrection now and again to keep things fresh. Lady Shar would approve.
SharranInformer_2.context: NodeContext: General comment after witnessing a coup against the leader of the Shar cult

SharranInformer_3.speaker: Ferg Drogher
SharranInformer_3.text: This is no place for idle visitors. You'd better be on your best behaviour.

SharranInformer_4.speaker: Ferg Drogher
SharranInformer_4.text: So, it seems the Dark Lady may have a new favourite. Interesting...
SharranInformer_4.context: NodeContext: Addressing Shadowheart. Hedging his bets (she could take over the cult, or fail)

SharranInformer_5.speaker: Ferg Drogher
SharranInformer_5.text: I am eager to serve, my lady.

SharranInformer_6.speaker: Ferg Drogher
SharranInformer_6.text: Act as though you're being watched at all times - because you are.

SharranInformer_7.speaker: Ferg Drogher
SharranInformer_7.text: Shadowheart. Never have I seen a lamb rush so eagerly to the slaughter.

SharranInformer_8.speaker: Ferg Drogher
SharranInformer_8.text: My lady. I am your most humble servant. Now and forever.

PAD_LossDoor_0.speaker: Player
PAD_LossDoor_0.text: No keyhole. Must be another way in.

AD_GrottoSentry_0.speaker: Sentry Fredrichk
AD_GrottoSentry_0.text: Keep going - the Mother Superior is expecting you.

AD_TrainingGrounds_0.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
AD_TrainingGrounds_0.text: Remember - feint, distract, deceive. The blade is not the only weapon at your distraction.
AD_TrainingGrounds_0.context: NodeContext: Giving instructions to shar cult trainees at a training site.

AD_TrainingGrounds_1.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
AD_TrainingGrounds_1.text: Never turn your back on a fallen foe until you are sure they are dead.
AD_TrainingGrounds_1.context: NodeContext: Giving instructions to shar cult trainees at a training site.

AD_TrainingGrounds_2.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
AD_TrainingGrounds_2.text: And remember - even a graze can be fatal to the enemy, if you poison your blade.
AD_TrainingGrounds_2.context: NodeContext: Giving instructions to shar cult trainees at a training site.

AD_TrainingGrounds_3.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
AD_TrainingGrounds_3.text: Stab the corpse if you must. Do not die because of carelessness.
AD_TrainingGrounds_3.context: NodeContext: Giving instructions to shar cult trainees at a training site.

Trainee_002_0.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
Trainee_002_0.text: Many of our flock died so that you could seek Lady Shar's glory on that mission. I hope you have not squandered it.

Trainee_002_1.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
Trainee_002_1.text: Apostate. Don't speak to me. Don't even look at me.

Trainee_002_2.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
Trainee_002_2.text: Many seek the Dark Lady's embrace, but few have what it truly takes.

Trainee_002_3.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
Trainee_002_3.text: Whatever fate is coming to you will be too lenient.

Trainee_002_4.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
Trainee_002_4.text: Lady Shar has chosen the very best to lead us.

Trainee_002_5.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
Trainee_002_5.text: I shall not fail you, my lady.

Trainee_002_6.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
Trainee_002_6.text: Lady Shar may have honoured you, but I  prefer silence to conversation. Even with you.

Trainee_002_7.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
Trainee_002_7.text: The unworthy had to be removed. It was the Nightsinger's will.

Trainee_002_8.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
Trainee_002_8.text: Watch your step, and your tongue.

Trainee_001_0.speaker: Sharran Novice Tylda
Trainee_001_0.text: It shouldn't have been you. I should have been chosen for that mission. I should be the one basking in the Dark Lady's graces.

Trainee_001_1.speaker: Sharran Novice Tylda
Trainee_001_1.text: The Mother Superior was unworthy, otherwise Lady Shar would have granted her victory.

Trainee_001_2.speaker: Sharran Novice Tylda
Trainee_001_2.text: Perhaps the Mother Superior will show mercy, and kill you quickly.

Trainee_001_3.speaker: Sharran Novice Tylda
Trainee_001_3.text: You honour me with your gaze, my lady.

Trainee_001_4.speaker: Sharran Novice Tylda
Trainee_001_4.text: It will be my privilege to follow you into battle, my lady.

Trainee_001_5.speaker: Sharran Novice Tylda
Trainee_001_5.text: The fools above live for daylight, only to be burned by it. The darkness soothes, caresses.

Trainee_001_6.speaker: Sharran Novice Tylda
Trainee_001_6.text: When the last hearth dies and the final candle sputters out, we shall rise, and reclaim all.

Trainee_001_7.speaker: Sharran Novice Tylda
Trainee_001_7.text: You'll be humbled soon enough. Just wait until the Mother Superior is finished with you.

Trainee_001_8.speaker: Sharran Novice Tylda
Trainee_001_8.text: It pains me to look upon you. Such wasted promise.

PAD_ShadowheartShelf_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ShadowheartShelf_0.text: These are all about me... forty years of my life, documented like I was some sort of specimen.
PAD_ShadowheartShelf_0.context: NodeContext: Shock/dismay. Reacting to discovering the 'school reports' on her years of indoctrination by the sharrans.

PAD_ShadowheartShelf_1.speaker: Player
PAD_ShadowheartShelf_1.text: These volumes... they're all about Shadowheart. Years of training and tutelage.

PAD_ShadowheartCorridor_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_ShadowheartCorridor_2.text: I remember this place now. A whole stolen childhood, spent in these halls.
PAD_ShadowheartCorridor_2.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH abandoned Shar.  Commenting on the Shar cloister as she moves through it to confront her superior

PAD_ShadowheartCorridor_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_ShadowheartCorridor_0.text: The Mother Superior must be close. Soon this will all be over.
PAD_ShadowheartCorridor_0.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH abandoned Shar.  Commenting on the Shar cloister as she moves through it to confront her superior

PAD_ShadowheartCorridor_3.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_ShadowheartCorridor_3.text: The Mother Superior raised all of this from nothing, in secret. It took years.
PAD_ShadowheartCorridor_3.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH is loyal to Shar. Commenting on the Shar cloister as she moves through it to confront her superior

PAD_ShadowheartCorridor_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_ShadowheartCorridor_1.text: Soon it'll be mine. And with Lady Shar's blessing, it will become even greater.
PAD_ShadowheartCorridor_1.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH is loyal to Shar. Commenting on the Shar cloister as she moves through it to confront her superior

AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_002_0.speaker: Sharran Novice Greymask
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_002_0.text: Dark Lady, all is changed. Give us guidance.
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_002_0.context: NodeContext: Unsure, seeking solace. Murmuring a quiet prayer to self/the Goddess Shar, after surviving a coup and battle against the (now former) leader of the Shar cult.

AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_002_1.speaker: Sharran Novice Greymask
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_002_1.text: I remain your humble servant, Lady Shar. I will serve whoever you desire.
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_002_1.context: NodeContext: Unsure, seeking solace. Murmuring a quiet prayer to self/the Goddess Shar, after surviving a coup and battle against the (now former) leader of the Shar cult.

AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_002_2.speaker: Sharran Novice Greymask
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_002_2.text: Let your darkness shield us in uncertain times, Lady Shar.
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_002_2.context: NodeContext: Unsure, seeking solace. Murmuring a quiet prayer to self/the Goddess Shar, after surviving a coup and battle against the (now former) leader of the Shar cult.

AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_002_3.speaker: Sharran Novice Greymask
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_002_3.text: If you require my life, so be it. I am yours, Nightsinger. Now and always.
AD_Interim_ViconiaCultist_002_3.context: NodeContext: Unsure, seeking solace. Murmuring a quiet prayer to self/the Goddess Shar, after surviving a coup and battle against the (now former) leader of the Shar cult.

DoorGuard_0.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Lamona
DoorGuard_0.text: It will be my honour to serve you, my lady.

DoorGuard_1.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Lamona
DoorGuard_1.text: The Mother Superior... gone? She built this place, enlisted each one of us... What now?

DoorGuard_2.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Lamona
DoorGuard_2.text: Any disrespect towards Lady Shar's house shall be answered for - understand?

DoorGuard_3.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Lamona
DoorGuard_3.text: It's true, then - you turned your back on Lady Shar. Disgrace.

DoorGuard_4.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Lamona
DoorGuard_4.text: The Mother Superior awaits you. Go and state your case.

DoorGuard_5.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Lamona
DoorGuard_5.text: At least you have the courage to return and face the Mother Superior's wrath.

DoorGuard_6.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Lamona
DoorGuard_6.text: This is a holy place - you would be wise to show respect.

DoorGuard_7.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Lamona
DoorGuard_7.text: I heard of you... but you're not as I imagined, somehow. Curious, to see what it looks like to be favoured by Lady Shar.

DoorGuard_8.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Lamona
DoorGuard_8.text: My lady. May you lead to glory.

AD_SwearFealty_ViconiaCultist_001_0.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
AD_SwearFealty_ViconiaCultist_001_0.text: This is the Nightsinger's will. I live to serve.
AD_SwearFealty_ViconiaCultist_001_0.context: NodeContext: Fervent declaration of loyalty 'all hail the queen'

PAD_AttackedParent_0.speaker: Player
PAD_AttackedParent_0.text: Stay your hand - these two must be important.

AD_ViconiaHeartForm_0.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_0.text: You bear a prying heart - how shameless. Let me slake your thirst for secrets.
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_0.context: NodeContext: battle taunt, referring back to the player's personality type (or heartform) as discovered earlier. A corresponding  magic curse will accompany each taunt

AD_ViconiaHeartForm_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_1.text: A heartform of shadow. I know you too well, girl. I know exactly what hurts you most.
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_1.context: NodeContext: battle taunt, referring back to the player's personality type (or heartform) as discovered earlier - in this case specific to Shadowhear. A corresponding  magic curse will accompany each taunt

AD_ViconiaHeartForm_2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_2.text: You bear a jealous heart, but fear not - my attention is all yours.
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_2.context: NodeContext: battle taunt, referring back to the player's personality type (or heartform) as discovered earlier. A corresponding  magic curse will accompany each taunt

AD_ViconiaHeartForm_3.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_3.text: Your false heart shall soon face the truth of your mortality.
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_3.context: NodeContext: battle taunt, referring back to the player's personality type (or heartform) as discovered earlier. A corresponding  magic curse will accompany each taunt

AD_ViconiaHeartForm_4.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_4.text: A violent heart - how appropriate. You shall be true to yourself, in your final moments.
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_4.context: NodeContext: battle taunt, referring back to the player's personality type (or heartform) as discovered earlier. A corresponding  magic curse will accompany each taunt

AD_ViconiaHeartForm_5.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_5.text: A melancholy heart - how tragic. Soon your troubles will be behind you.
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_5.context: NodeContext: battle taunt, referring back to the player's personality type (or heartform) as discovered earlier. A corresponding  magic curse will accompany each taunt

AD_ViconiaHeartForm_6.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_6.text: Your craven heart cannot flee this time.
AD_ViconiaHeartForm_6.context: NodeContext: battle taunt, referring back to the player's personality type (or heartform) as discovered earlier. A corresponding  magic curse will accompany each taunt

PAD_TortureBench_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TortureBench_0.text: There's so much I can't remember, yet I picked up these implements... I'd know exactly what to do.
PAD_TortureBench_0.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH abandoned shar. Shudder of horror, reacting to a bench of torture implements that feel oddly familiar.

PAD_TortureBench_1.speaker: Player
PAD_TortureBench_1.text: All these implements... I'd wager they'd feel familiar in my hands. I learned so much here.
PAD_TortureBench_1.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH is loyal to Shar. Thoughful, reacting to a bench of torture implements that feel oddly familiar.

PAD_TortureBench_2.speaker: Player
PAD_TortureBench_2.text: Imagine what these things could do to a person...
PAD_TortureBench_2.context: NodeContext: Reacting to a bench full of torture implements

PAD_Mannequins_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Mannequins_0.text: What are these mannequins here for?

Cultist_001_0.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
Cultist_001_0.text: The dark will swallow us all, in the end. Best to bow to it now.

Cultist_001_1.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
Cultist_001_1.text: Away with you, or they'll accuse me of heresy by association.

Cultist_001_2.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
Cultist_001_2.text: Have you come to seek the embrace? You must be prepared to surrender it all.

Cultist_001_3.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
Cultist_001_3.text: Perhaps you can tell me what it was like some time, to feel Lady Shar's presence... if you survive, of course.

Cultist_001_4.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
Cultist_001_4.text: I can sense Lady Shar's favour upon you... why does the Mother Superior not welcome you, then?

Cultist_001_5.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
Cultist_001_5.text: And to think, some doubted you. But not me, my lady. Never me.

Cultist_001_6.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
Cultist_001_6.text: A new era can begin, now that we have purged ourselves.

Cultist_001_7.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
Cultist_001_7.text: Seek the Mother Superior. Your judgement awaits.

Cultist_001_8.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
Cultist_001_8.text: I always suspected you were destined for greatness, my lady.

AD_SwearFealty_ViconiaCultist_000_0.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
AD_SwearFealty_ViconiaCultist_000_0.text: Lady Shar has spoken. I live to serve her chosen vessel.
AD_SwearFealty_ViconiaCultist_000_0.context: NodeContext: Fervent declaration of loyalty. 'all hail the queen'

AD_OnTurn_SharranTrainee_001_0.speaker: Sharran Novice Tylda
AD_OnTurn_SharranTrainee_001_0.text: Lady Shar's will shall be done! Her foes shall perish!

AD_OnTurn_SharranTrainee_001_3.speaker: Sharran Novice Tylda
AD_OnTurn_SharranTrainee_001_3.text: I offer your death to the Nightsinger.

PAD_HeistInterrogation_0.speaker: Player
PAD_HeistInterrogation_0.text: They tortured the githyanki to learn about the Astral Prism. Look like it went on for days...

Trainee_006_0.speaker: Sharran Novice Humboldt
Trainee_006_0.text: I wonder what Lady Shar sees in you...

Trainee_006_1.speaker: Sharran Novice Humboldt
Trainee_006_1.text: It will be strange, to answer to a different leader. The Mother Superior has ruled this place for as long as I've known it.

Trainee_006_2.speaker: Sharran Novice Humboldt
Trainee_006_2.text: There is no future for those who do not embrace Lady Shar.

Trainee_006_3.speaker: Sharran Novice Humboldt
Trainee_006_3.text: This is a place of faith. Do not sully it with pointless chatter.

Trainee_006_4.speaker: Sharran Novice Humboldt
Trainee_006_4.text: So the rumours are true. You are blessed. The Mother Superior will not be pleased.

Trainee_006_5.speaker: Sharran Novice Humboldt
Trainee_006_5.text: Traitor. Say not one word to me.

Trainee_006_6.speaker: Sharran Novice Humboldt
Trainee_006_6.text: Have care, my lady. Those who smile to your face will sharpen blades behind your back.

Trainee_006_7.speaker: Sharran Novice Humboldt
Trainee_006_7.text: Danger is constant, even for the likes of you, my lady.

Trainee_006_8.speaker: Sharran Novice Humboldt
Trainee_006_8.text: Away, heretic. You disturb me - in more ways than one.

AD_OnTurn_GrottoCheckpointGuard_001_0.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Hyrald
AD_OnTurn_GrottoCheckpointGuard_001_0.text: Lady Shar's will shall be done - sure as night shall fall!

AD_OnTurn_GrottoCheckpointGuard_001_2.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Hyrald
